author: OddsShark
title: College football week 7: Sizing up state of USC after Sarkisian - College Football -
text:
by Zac Ellis & Lindsay Schnell Posted: Wed Oct. 14, 2015 It’s been a week of major off-field news from Florida quarterback Will Grier ’s suspension for failing a test for performance-enhancing drugs to South Carolina head coach Steve Spurrier’s retirement. But no story has been bigger than Steve Sarkisian’s firing at USC .
Lindsey Thiry of the Los Angeles Times and Fox Sports 1 joins hosts Zac Ellis and Lindsay Schnell to break down the chaos with the Trojans. What should USC look for in its next coach and how can interim coach Clay Helton keep this year’s team from falling apart? Thiry lends her insights from the scene.
College Football Video Report: USC fired coach Steve Sarkisian for cause by SI Wire
